author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Globant Reports Qtrly Earnings Per Share $0.34
text:
Feb 15 (Reuters) - Globant Sa:
* GLOBANT REPORTS 2017 FULL YEAR AND FOURTH QUARTER FINANCIAL RESULTS
* SEES FY 2018 ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE $1.52 TO $1.62 * SEES Q1 2018 ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.31 TO $0.35 * Q4 REVENUE ROSE 32.3 PERCENT TO $115.4 MILLION * SEES FY 2018 REVENUE $495 MILLION TO $505 MILLION * SEES Q1 2018 REVENUE $113 MILLION TO $115 MILLION * SEES FY 2018 REVENUE UP 20.9 PERCENT * SEES Q1 2018 REVENUE UP 28.5 PERCENT * QTRLY EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.34 * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.38, REVENUE VIEW $109.1 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.32, REVENUE VIEW $108.8 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* FY2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $1.57, REVENUE VIEW $492.3 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
Our Standards: The Thomson Reuters Trust Principles.
